      • quoted

        public void quoted(java.lang.String toColor,
                   int pos,
                   java.lang.String quoteSign,
                   java.lang.String blockStart,
                   java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Colors string literals in brown
        Parameters:
        toColor - the text of the document or a section thereof
        pos - the start position of 'toColor' within the entire text
        quoteSign - the quote sign, i.e either single or double quote
        blockStart - the String that represents the start of a text block where the String literal must be found in. Null to ignore any ocurrence in a block
        blockEnd - the String that represents the end of a text block where the String literal must be found in. Not null if 'blockStart' is not null

      • lineComments

        public void lineComments(java.lang.String toColor,
                         int pos,
                         java.lang.String lineCmnt)
        Searches line comments and colors commented lines in green
        Parameters:
        toColor - the text of the document or a section thereof
        pos - the start position of 'toColor' within the entire text
        lineCmnt - the String that equals the start of a line comment

      • blockComments

        public void blockComments(java.lang.String allText,
                          java.lang.String blockStart,
                          java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Searches and colors block comments in green
        Parameters:
        allText - the entire text
        blockStart - the String that represents the start signal for a block
        blockEnd - the String that represents the end signal for a block
